Description.Text: This hotel is a 3* ideal for the budget traveler for location and relation price/service. (BR 03/10) Authentic traditional local style with character. Asur Hotel distinguished hotel among the historical heritages of Istanbul. It is 500 m. away from the Grand Bazaar and Suleymaniye mosque, 300 meters away from Blue Mosque, St. Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Saint Sophia Museum and other worldwide famous museums. The distance from to airport is 16 km.Asur Hotel has 34 rooms and 70 beds,Wireless internet Access. Great Location!

Guest Rooms - Medium sized rooms equipped with all amenities necessary to make a comfortable accommodation such as air conditioning, central heating, mini bar, color tv satellite channels, direct dial telephones and hair dryers, present in all of 34 rooms.
